name: Smoothie Chef!
description:
*NOTE: THE QUIT BUTTONS DO NOT WORK IN THE WEB BUILD OF THE GAME

*NOTE: THE DOWNLOADABLE VERSION ALLOWS YOU TO PLAY IN FULL SCREEN

Hey chef! This game is my submission for the Illinois State Winter 2022 game jam! You play as a mustached chef looking to make some smoothies who has to avoid an evil knife in the kitchen. You can play it in browser or download it. Feel free to leave some feedback and/or your high score in the comments below!

Controls Reference:

Movement(chef and ingredient) - WASD or Arrow Keys

Get cherry- walk up to jar as chef, click anywhere on the screen

Activate cherry powerup- spacebar

Credits:

-Knife AI uses Astar pathfinding

-Various Sound effects from pixabay.com

-Background music from PlayOnLoop.com
